metadata.othernotes:
Background (ie RWBY crash course)
-Pyrrha is a student at Beacon Academy, which trains its students to fight and kill the creatures of Grimm to defend the population of Remnant. Beacon is located just outside of the Kingdom of Vale, one of the four nations on Remnant.
-Pyrrha's Semblance (a unique power each person with an activated aura has) is Polarity, which grants her ferromagnetic control over objects she touches and can also be used as an area-of-effect attack.
-Pyrrha is a well-known champion of four tournaments in the Kingdom of Mistral, and appears on the box of a breakfast cereal.
-Pyrrha uses a spear/sword/rifle called Miló and a shield called Akoúo̱, though she does not bring them to the inventory.
-Pyrrha is part of Team JNPR, along with Jaune, Nora, and Ren.
-This Pyrrha is from an alternate universe where the events of Volume 3 unfolded differently, and is 20 years old.

Personality and hobbies
-Pyrrha speaks fairly formally, and frequently apologizes for minor things, or even when helping others.
-She prefers subtlety in combat, and is a quick thinker able to analyze opponents. Many of her generics comment on the state of the game, as she has a competitive spirit and a sense of sportsmanship.
-She takes her studies and training very seriously.
-Her celebrity status frequently isolates her from other people.
-Pyrrha takes her ideals of justice and responsibility very seriously, and acts selflessly as a result, often to a fault.
-Pyrrha is playing the game to break out of her comfort zone and meet new people. Also, she's horny.

case.name: Why are you playing?
case.description: Pyrrha asks the table why each of them are playing, and internally hopes that no one recognizes her.

case.name: Desiring Fame
case.description: Pyrrha asks the table if they would want to be famous, and what they would want to be famous for. Note that Pyrrha is famous on Remnant.

case.name: Serious Topics
case.description: Pyrrha asks the table if they think that there's any topic too serious to be joked about.

case.name: Friendship
case.description: Pyrrha asks the table how they define friendship.

case.name: Polarity Burst
case.description: Pyrrha's Polarity Semblance activates when she finishes, which may affect electronics.

case.name: Tomorrow's plans
case.description: Pyrrha asks the table what their plans for tomorrow are.

notes.note: targeted by Erufuda. Notify Mike if changed.
If music is added to the game, I'll need to change one of the lines here.

This line is meant to give other writers an opportunity to write about their character's motivation. I won't respond to responses to it, unless they have a marker and I think of something interesting to respond with. Targeted exchanges in hand quality lines are clunky, so I prefer to do them in stripping sequences.

This line is meant to give other writers an opportunity to write about their character's backstory or lore. I won't respond to responses to it, unless they have a marker and I think of something interesting to respond with. Targeted exchanges in hand quality lines are clunky, so I prefer to do them in stripping sequences.

This line is meant to give other writers an opportunity to write about their character's personality and values. I won't respond to responses to it, unless they have a marker and I think of something interesting to respond with. Targeted exchanges in hand quality lines are clunky, so I prefer to do them in stripping sequences.

I won't respond to responses to it, unless they have a marker and I think of something interesting to respond with. Targeted exchanges in hand quality lines are clunky, so I prefer to do them in stripping sequences.

I won't respond to responses to it, unless they have a marker and I think of something interesting to respond with. Targeted exchanges in hand quality lines are clunky, so I prefer to do them in stripping sequences.
Miló is the xiphos/javelin/rifle Akoúo̱ is the shield

markers.marker: The game has narrowed down to Pyrrha versus one other player.
Pyrrha asks if she gets her boots back.
Pyrrha says that she's not used to walking around without heels.
Pyrrha mentions her leg armor.
The other 3 opponents are from the same source material.
The other 3 opponents are from the same source material.
Pyrrha responds to Futaba's question about the kind of music she likes.
Pyrrha asks Catria if she is going to leave upon finding out about the forfeit rule.
Pyrrha asks the table what they think friendship is.
Pyrrha loses the first or second round of the game.
Pyrrha will comment on the Beach background, saying that the beach is empty.
If Pyrrha is winning and all other players are naked, she will suggest ending the game early with her as the winner.
The other 3 opponents are from the same source material.
When a female opponent strips an accessory while Pyrrha is naked, Pyrrha mentions her female friends, and that they would remove something larger out of sympathy.
Pyrrha asks Florina if she is a huntress.
If other characters have guns, Pyrrha will comment that guns are useful for killing Grimm.
Pyrrha says she is a huntress, not a professional poker player.
When commenting on another opponent's winning streak after they lost, Pyrrha asks if she distracted them (while topless).
When a male opponent strips an accessory while Pyrrha is naked, Pyrrha mentions her male friends, and that they would remove something larger out of sympathy.
Pyrrha tells Megumin that she and her team killed a Death Stalker (a gigantic scorpion Grimm).
Pyrrha is confused about Meia's request for Earth's sightseeing opportunities.
Pyrrha tells Jura to respect Meia's boundaries when they start their dual forfeit.
Pyrrha says she doesn't have any relationship experience with men and asks Meia for a more specific question about men.
Pyrrha states that she will force Meia to enjoy her birthday.
Pyrrha mentions that she has done modeling before.
Pyrrha asks Nami if her ability to make a rain cloud is her semblance.
Pyrrha finds out that Nami is a pirate, and talks about the piracy around Vacuo.
Pyrrha asks if Navi is a firefly or a Grimm firefly.
Pyrrha asks if her electromagnetic semblance (polarity) affected anyones' phones after her finish.
Pyrrha asks Pit if he is a faunus.
Pyrrha asks Pit about his wings.
Pyrrha demands that Revy and Meia stop fighting, threatening to break them up.
Pyrrha asks Shantae if her transformation into a monkey is her semblance.
Pyrrha may comment that her teammates can't help her if she has a bad hand.
Pyrrha asks Tharja if her magic powers are her semblance.
Pyrrha asks the table if they think that any topic is too serious to be joked about.
When losing, Pyrrha mentions that she didn't train as much today to have time to play.
Pyrrha asks the table if they would like to be famous, and what they would like to be famous for.
When several other players are armed, Pyrrha will comment about the weapons being needed to fight Grimm.
Pyrrha asks Nami if her raincloud is a product of her semblance.
Pyrrha asks L'Arachel where Rausten is.
Pyrrha asks everyone at the table why they're playing.
Pyrrha asks Yuelia if her appearance as a butterfly is her semblance.
Pyrrha asks Yuelia how she turns into a butterfly.

pendingLines.line: You said you're going to do some people watching, Yusuke? How long have you been interested in that?
